languages.text: "Уже нет. Несколько подразделений блюстителей оказались скомпрометированы, но я перекрыла в их отсеках вентиляционные системы и удушила. После для верности пройдемся с огнеметами, сожжем тела и проведем осмотр личного состава. Любых подозрительных — в шлюз".

"Not anymore. Several enforcer squads were compromised, but I shut down the ventilation systems in their compartments and asphyxiated them. Once we are done here, we will enter with flamers, burn the bodies, and do a personnel sweep. Anyone suspicious goes out of the airlock."
languages.original_text: "Уже нет. Несколько подразделений блюстителей оказались скомпрометированы, но я перекрыла в их отсеках вентиляционные системы и удушила. После для верности пройдемся с огнеметами, сожжем тела и проведем осмотр личного состава. Любых подозрительных — в шлюз".

traits.locale_text: "Not anymore. Several enforcer squads have been compromised, but I shut down the ventilation systems in their compartments and asphyxiated them. Once we are done, we will go in with flamethrowers, burn the bodies and do a personnel sweep. Anyone suspicious goes out of the airlock."
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

traits.locale_text: "Not anymore. Several enforcer squads have been compromised, but I shut down the ventilation systems in their compartments and asphyxiated them. Once we are done, we will go in with flamethrowers, burn the bodies and do a personnel sweep. Anyone suspicious goes out of the airlock."
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

Once we are done here, we will enter with flamethrowers, burn the bodies, and do a personnel sweep. Anyone suspicious goes out of the airlock."

Once we are done here, we will enter with flamethrowers, burn the bodies, and do a personnel sweep. Anyone suspicious goes out of the airlock."

traits.locale_text: "Not anymore. Several enforcer squads were compromised, but I shut down the ventilation systems in their compartments and asphyxiated them. Once we are done here, we will enter with flamers, burn the bodies, and do a personnel sweep. Anyone suspicious goes out of the airlock."
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: «Ya no. Varios escuadrones de seguridad habían sido infiltrados, pero he desconectado los sistemas de ventilación de sus compartimentos para asfixiarlos. Cuando terminemos aquí, recogeremos los lanzallamas, quemaremos los cadáveres y realizaremos una purga del personal. Cualquiera que levante sospechas irá por la esclusa».
languages.original_text: "Not anymore. Several enforcer squads were compromised, but I shut down the ventilation systems in their compartments and asphyxiated them. Once we are done here, we will enter with flamers, burn the bodies, and do a personnel sweep. Anyone suspicious goes out of the airlock."

traits.locale_text: «Ya no. Varios escuadrones de seguridad habían sido infiltrados, pero he desconectado los sistemas de ventilación de sus compartimentos para asfixiarlos. Cuando terminemos aquí, recogeremos los lanzallamas, quemaremos los cadáveres y realizaremos una purga del personal. Cualquiera que levante sospechas irá por la esclusa».
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: 「もう大丈夫です。複数のエンフォーサーの小隊が危険な状態でしたが、私が区画の換気システムを停止させ、窒息死させました。ここでの作業が終わったら、フレイマーを持って突撃して死体を燃やし、隊員を片付けます。不審な者は、エアロックから出て行くでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Not anymore. Several enforcer squads were compromised, but I shut down the ventilation systems in their compartments and asphyxiated them. Once we are done here, we will enter with flamers, burn the bodies, and do a personnel sweep. Anyone suspicious goes out of the airlock."

traits.locale_text: 「もう大丈夫です。複数のエンフォーサーの小隊が危険な状態でしたが、私が区画の換気システムを停止させ、窒息死させました。ここでの作業が終わったら、フレイマーを持って突撃して死体を燃やし、隊員を片付けます。不審な者は、エアロックから出て行くでしょう」
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: “已经没有了。有几支执法者小队受到了影响，但我关闭了那些舱室的通风系统，把他们全都憋死了。等这边的事情结束之后，我们会立刻带着火焰喷射器冲过去，把所有尸体都烧光。在这之后，我们会对所有人进行彻查，所有可疑分子都会被当场扔出气闸。”
languages.original_text: "Not anymore. Several enforcer squads were compromised, but I shut down the ventilation systems in their compartments and asphyxiated them. Once we are done here, we will enter with flamers, burn the bodies, and do a personnel sweep. Anyone suspicious goes out of the airlock."

traits.locale_text: “已经没有了。有几支执法者小队受到了影响，但我关闭了那些舱室的通风系统，把他们全都憋死了。等这边的事情结束之后，我们会立刻带着火焰喷射器冲过去，把所有尸体都烧光。在这之后，我们会对所有人进行彻查，所有可疑分子都会被当场扔出气闸。”
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: "Nicht mehr. Mehrere Enforcer-Trupps wurden kompromittiert, doch ich habe die Belüftungssysteme in ihren Modulen ausgeschaltet und sie erstickt. Wenn wir hier fertig sind, gehen wir mit Flammenwerfern hinein, verbrennen die Leichen und überprüfen das gesamte Personal. Wer verdächtig wirkt, fliegt aus der Luftschleuse."
languages.original_text: "Not anymore. Several enforcer squads were compromised, but I shut down the ventilation systems in their compartments and asphyxiated them. Once we are done here, we will enter with flamers, burn the bodies, and do a personnel sweep. Anyone suspicious goes out of the airlock."

traits.locale_text: "Nicht mehr. Mehrere Enforcer-Trupps wurden kompromittiert, doch ich habe die Belüftungssysteme in ihren Modulen ausgeschaltet und sie erstickt. Wenn wir hier fertig sind, gehen wir mit Flammenwerfern hinein, verbrennen die Leichen und überprüfen das gesamte Personal. Wer verdächtig wirkt, fliegt aus der Luftschleuse."
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: « Plus maintenant. Comme plusieurs escouades de prévôts ont été compromises, j'ai tout simplement coupé les systèmes de ventilation des compartiments où ils se trouvaient pour les asphyxier. Une fois que nous en aurons terminé ici, nous brûlerons tous les corps au lance-flammes et nous passerons le personnel au peigne fin. Tout individu suspect sera envoyé dans le vide. »
languages.original_text: "Not anymore. Several enforcer squads were compromised, but I shut down the ventilation systems in their compartments and asphyxiated them. Once we are done here, we will enter with flamers, burn the bodies, and do a personnel sweep. Anyone suspicious goes out of the airlock."

traits.locale_text: « Plus maintenant. Comme plusieurs escouades de prévôts ont été compromises, j'ai tout simplement coupé les systèmes de ventilation des compartiments où ils se trouvaient pour les asphyxier. Une fois que nous en aurons terminé ici, nous brûlerons tous les corps au lance-flammes et nous passerons le personnel au peigne fin. Tout individu suspect sera envoyé dans le vide. »
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: "Artık yok. Bazı infazcı mangaları tehlike arz ediyordu, ben de kompartımanlarındaki havalandırma sistemlerini kapatıp onları havasız bıraktım. Buradaki işimiz biter bitmez alevsaçanlarla gireceğiz, bedenlerini yakacağız ve personel taraması yapacağız. Şüphe uyandıran herkes, hava kilidinden dışarı uçacak."
languages.original_text: "Not anymore. Several enforcer squads were compromised, but I shut down the ventilation systems in their compartments and asphyxiated them. Once we are done here, we will enter with flamers, burn the bodies, and do a personnel sweep. Anyone suspicious goes out of the airlock."
